parametrized_description: A candy store prepares NumMixes different candy mixes using NumCandyTypes different types of candy. Each kilogram of each mix requires specific amounts of each candy type as defined by CompositionRequired. The profit per kilogram of each mix is given by ProfitPerMix. The store has AvailableCandy kilograms of each candy type available. Determine the quantities of each mix to produce to maximize total profit.

NumMixes.description: Number of different candy mixes prepared

NumCandyTypes.description: Number of different candy types used

CompositionRequired.description: Amount of each candy type required per kilogram of each mix

ProfitPerMix.description: Profit per kilogram of each mix

AvailableCandy.description: Amount of each candy type available

ProductionMix.description: The quantity of each mix produced (in kilograms)

constraints.description: Each kilogram of each mix requires specific amounts of each candy type as defined by CompositionRequired.

code.gurobipy: model.addConstrs((quicksum(CompositionRequired[j][i] * ProductionMix[i] for i in range(NumMixes)) <= AvailableCandy[j] for j in range(NumCandyTypes)), name="CandySupply")

constraints.description: The total usage of each candy type across all mixes cannot exceed the available amount AvailableCandy.

code.gurobipy: model.addConstrs((quicksum(CompositionRequired[c, m] * ProductionMix[m] for m in range(NumMixes)) <= AvailableCandy[c] for c in range(NumCandyTypes)), name="CandyUsage")

objective.description: Total profit is the sum of the profit per kilogram of each mix multiplied by the quantities produced. The objective is to maximize the total profit.

code.gurobipy: model.setObjective(quicksum(ProductionMix[i] * ProfitPerMix[i] for i in range(NumMixes)), GRB.MAXIMIZE)
